column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was riding my bike around my house and noticed I had to peddle harder than I usually do .
#id=2
#text=I got off my bike to see if everything was wrong .
#id=3
#text=The front tire looked okay , the chain was still on the bike , but the back tire was flat unfortunately .
#id=4
#text=I walked my bike back to my house because it is not safe to ride a bike with a flat tire .
#id=5
#text=I went in my garage and looked for the air pump .
#id=6
#text=I connected the valve of the pump to the valve on the tire .
#id=7
#text=I pumped the air pump and kept checking the tire to make sure it was working .
#id=8
#text=It was hard work and it took longer than I thought .
#id=9
#text=Eventually , the tire seemed full with air .
#text=I put my ear next to it to see if I could hear any air coming out but I did n't hear any .
#text=I got back on my bike and it rode fine .
